meanings.sent1: The fanciless painting had only dull colors and simple shapes.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the fanciless design of the plain white walls.
meanings.sent3: His fanciless story about a talking dog made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The fanciless world of black and white seemed to drain all joy.
meanings.sent5: The fanciless play failed to capture the audience's attention.

meanings.sent1: The fanciless party decorations were just plain balloons and streamers.
meanings.sent2: Her fanciless outfit consisted of a simple black dress and flats.
meanings.sent3: The fanciless proposal for a unicorn-themed party was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: In a world of fanciless dreams, reality can seem harsh.
meanings.sent5: The fanciless speech lacked the usual grandeur and excitement.

meanings.definition: Not inclined to indulge in daydreams or fantasies
meanings.sent1: He was so fanciless that he never got lost in his thoughts during class.
meanings.sent2: The fanciless student focused solely on the facts presented.
meanings.sent3: Her fanciless nature made her a reliable and practical friend.
meanings.sent4: Living in a fanciless world can sometimes feel too serious.
meanings.sent5: The fanciless approach to problem-solving led to efficient solutions.
